definitions.title: part of relation
definitions.body: , who, which, that, used also as

definitions.title: mark of gen.
definitions.body: and

definitions.title: conj.
definitions.body: that, because (Aram. of Nineveh, Bab. Zinj. Nerab, Cilicia, Têma, Egypt, [[זִי]] (Lzb:267. 446 RES:361 S-C:Pap. A 2 +); Nab. Palm. [[די]]; Targum [[דְּ]] (exc. in cpds., as [[דִּילִי]] mine, [[דִּילֵיהּ]] his); Sam. d; Syr. d; Eth. z: za: of same origin as Ar. d-uw possessor of [cf. sub BH [[זֶה]]]. Properly a demonstr. that [cf. [[זֶה]]; in Eth. ze is ‘this’, za ‘which’]; but this being referred by usage to something preceding becomes equiv. to the relative who, which, used, however, more widely than Heb. [[אֲשֶׁר]]);—
as

definitions.title: rel.
definitions.body: who, which (construed like [[אֲשֶׁר]]): a. Je 10:11, Da 2:11 [[דִּי מְדָֽרְהוֹן]] whose dwelling, v:Da 2:24 [[דִּי מַנִּי מַלְבָּא]] whom the king had appointed, v:Da 2:26 ´[[דִּי שְׁמֵהּ בּ]]: whose name was B., Da 4:5, Da 5:12, Da 5:23, etc.; = that which Da 2:23; = him that Ezr 7:25; Ezr 6:15, Da 7:17 [[דִּת אִנוּן אַרְבַּע]] which are four (v. [[אִנּוּן]]). Sq. pron. of 2 ps. (cf. [[אֲשֶׁר]]
), Da 2:37 thou, O king ..., [[יְהַב לָח]]…[[דִּי]]: to whom... hath given, Da 4:19, Da 4:6 as to whom I know, etc. (cf. [[אֲשֶׁר]]

definitions.title: 4 d
definitions.body: end). Sq. [[תַּמָּה]] = where Ezr 6:1, so [[דִּי]] alone Ezr 6:3, Da 2:38; of time, [[בְּעִדָּנׇא דִּי]] at the time when, etc., Da 3:5, Da 3:15. With the pred. an inf. c. [[לְ]], Da 6:9 [[כְּתָבָא דִּי לָא לְהַשְׁנׇיׇה]] which is not to be changed, Ezr 6:8; a place- or other determination, Da 3:20 valiant men [[בְחֵילֵהּ]] that were in his army, Da 5:2 [[הֵיכְלָא דִּי בִירוּשְׁלֵב]], Da 7:20, Ezr 4:24, Ezr 5:6, Ezr 6:2, Ezr 6:6; cf. Da 2:25, Da 5:13, Da 7:7, Ezr 7:23. [[דִּי לָא]] = without, Ezr 6:9, Ezr 7:22 (so [[דְּלָא]] Targum Ge 15:2, Ex 21:11); cf. Da 2:34, Da 2:45.

definitions.title: 1 e
definitions.body: b) whoever, whatever, so † Da 3:6, Da 3:11 [[יִפֵּל מָֽן־דִּי־לָא]] whoever does not fall down, Da 4:14 [[לְמָן דִּי יִחְבֵּא]] to whomsoever he willeth, v:Da 4:22, v:Da 4:29, Da 5:21; [[מָה דִי]] whatever (or simply what), † Da 2:28 [[מָה דִּי לֶהֱוֵא]] what will be, v:Da 2:29, v:Da 2:29, v:Da 2:45, Ezr 6:8, Ezr 7:18.—Cf. K:§ 103.
as

definitions.title: mark of the gen.,
definitions.body: Da 2:15 [[שׁליטא די מלכא]] prop. the captain, that of the king = the king’s captain (a genuine Aram. idiom: so Targum [[דְּ]], Syr. d constantly), v:Da 2:19, v:Da 2:25, v:Da 2:49 + oft.: the subst. in such cases may be either in the emph. state (determined), as ll. cc. Ezr 4:15, Ezr 5:2, etc., or in the abs. state (undetermined), Da 5:5, Da 7:4, Da 7:9, Da 7:10 [[נְהַר דִּי נוּר]]; or it may have a pleon. sf., Da 2:20 [[שְׁמֵהּ דִּי אֱלָהָא]] lit. his name, that of God = God’s name, v:Da 2:44, Da 3:8, Da 3:25, Da 3:26, Da 4:23, etc. (so also Targum Syr.). To circumscribe an adj., esp. in specif. of the material: Da 2:38 thou art [[רֵאשָׁה דִּי דַהֲבָא]] the head of gold, v:Da 2:39, Da 3:1, Da 5:7, Da 5:16, Ezr 5:14, Ezr 6:4 +; as predic. Da 2:32 [[רֵאשֵׁהּ דִּי־דְהַב טָב]] his head (was) of fine gold, v:Da 2:33, Da 7:19; with a pron. Da 2:20 wisdom and might [[דִּי־לֵהּ הִיא]] are his; cf. Da 6:27 [[וּמַלְכוּתֵהּ דִּי־לָא תִתְחַבַּל]] his kingdom (is one) which shall not be destroyed, Da 7:14.—Vid. further K:§ 81.
as

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: that (quod), after vbs. of knowing, Da 2:8, Da 2:9, seeing Da 2:45, Da 3:27, hearing Da 5:14, etc.; introducing the subject of a sentence, …[[דִּי ]]:…[[יְדִיעַ]]: Da 3:18, Ezr 4:13; Da 2:47 …[[מִן־קְשׁׂט דִּי ]]: True is it that . . .  (cf. [[אָמְנׇם כִּי]] Job 12:2).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = in that, inasmuch as, whereas: Da 2:41 and whereas ([[דִּי]]) thou sawest, etc. . . . it shall be a divided kingdom, v:Da 2:43, Da 4:20, Da 4:23; as a connecting link = seeing that, because, for (cf. [[אֲשֶׁר]]

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: that (ut), after vbs. of asking Da 2:16, commanding Da 3:10, Da 3:29, expressing a purpose Da 4:3, Da 5:15, Ezr 4:15, Ezr 6:10 +; [[דִּי לָא]] that not (ne) Da 2:18, Da 3:28, Da 6:18 (on [[דִּי לְמָה]] lest Ezr 7:23, see [[מה]]).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: prefixed to direct narr. (like [[כִּי]]

definitions.title: 1 b,
definitions.body: and sts. [[אֲשֶׁר]]

definitions.title: 8 a
definitions.body: g, and o(/ti recitativum), Da 2:25 and said thus unto him [[דִּי־הַשְׁכַּחַת]] (that) I have found, etc., Da 5:7, Da 6:6, Da 6:14.
with preps. and other prefixes:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[כְּדִי]] (like Heb. [[כַּאֲשֶׁר]]; so Eg. Aram. [[כזי]], Palm. Nab. [[כדי]], Lzb:293 SAC:G1 62, 63 Cooke:369 b RES:361; Targum [[כַּד]], Syr. kd); a according as, Da 2:43; b. so soon as, when, Da 3:7, Da 5:20, Da 6:11, Da 6:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[מִן־דִּי]]: a. because that, Dn Da 3:22, Ezr 5:12 (cf. [[מֵאֲשֶׁר]] Is 43:4); b. from (the time) that, after (ex quo), Da 4:23, Ezr 4:23.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עַד דִּי]] until, Da 2:9, Da 2:34, Da 4:30, Da 7:22; = ere that Da 6:25.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[עַל דִּי]] Da 3:19 is not a conj., but means above that which ...

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: for [[עַל דִּבְרַת דִּי]] and [[כָּל־קֳבֵל דִּי]] see [[[דִּבְרָה]]] and [[קֳבֵל]].
